message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.NA, cs.MM, cs.IT

The paper deals with image processing and filtering, which are common topics in computer vision (cs.CV) and graphics (cs.GR). The use of box splines and their efficient realization through preintegration and local finite-differences suggests numerical analysis (cs.NA) and multimedia (cs.MM) as possible sub-categories. Finally, the scaling property and quasi-separable structure of box distributions hint at information theory (cs.IT) as another potential sub-category.
